name: Defines Temporal Correlations
description: Establishes the mathematical definitions and criteria for non-local temporal correlations between events at different times.
subject: urn:uor:resource:non-local-temporal-correlations
contextualDescription: The Non-Local Temporal Correlations resource defines the temporal correlation function, non-locality condition, temporal entanglement measure, and causal influence direction that together provide the mathematical foundation for analyzing relationships between events at different times that exceed conventional causal explanations.
